author: chintana
msg: Removing the MDB2 include. Don't need it anymore.

author: mattmann
msg: RE: TIKA-309, yes I can't count (4*1024 = 4096).

author: markt
msg: - new support class for common elements of parsing and writing
- better consistency between parsing and writing
- reduce visibility of methods where possible
- auto-switch to v1 for any attribute that might require quoting
- allow v0 cookies to break http spec (disabled by default)

author: mattmann
msg: - increasing the offset to 4k bytes for an appearing <html tag seems to have fixed the unstable build issue introduced by TIKA-309

author: trawick
msg: Check that an event was actually filled in when
This resolves a crash when receiving a signal.
